cont.entity_a: Wireless connection speed is significantly faster compared to Linksys.
cont.entity_b: Linksys router fails to connect to the internet after multiple replacements.

cont.entity_a: SSID cannot be turned off without causing connectivity problems. Advanced firewall configuration with time-based port opening. Firmware and drivers are not optimized for 22 Mbps mode. Router works well for basic internet sharing.
cont.entity_b: VPN functionality is unreliable. G-only mode does not work without manual adjustments. Support for VPN features is inadequate. Router has compatibility issues with certain VPN clients.

cont.entity_a: Router requires daily reboot to reset the wireless connection.
cont.entity_b: Router frequently crashes, even with firmware updates.

cont.entity_a: Full signal strength is available throughout the house. Wireless range is generally adequate.
cont.entity_b: Wireless performance is poor in mixed environments.

Setup.comm: Router is difficult to set up for non-technical users.

cont.entity_a: Initial setup was moderately successful but had issues with network visibility. Setup pages are cryptic, but manageable. Installation and setup are easy, with good instructions and wizards. Setup is straightforward, even for non-experts.
cont.entity_b: Setup and configuration are difficult. Some users report flawless hardware performance but setup requires IT knowledge.

cont.entity_a: DWL-650+ card interface is 20% faster than other 802.11b products. The antenna was defective, impacting Wi-Fi functionality.
cont.entity_b: Some users report flawless hardware performance but setup requires IT knowledge.

Support.comm: Customer service has long wait times.

cont.entity_b: Customer service is poor, with inadequate solutions.

cont.entity_a: Router is inexpensive and offers many features for the price.

Firmware.comm: Firmware updates are necessary for functionality improvements.

cont.entity_a: Firmware upgrades can solve many issues.
Occasional issues with DHCP and wireless range.
cont.entity_b: Mixed opinions on VPN capability and wireless performance.
Router is not recommended for small business use due to instability.
